author: rufusg.
content: <@425572898787426305> Can I ask for your help in getting https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/314 merged?  A few client teams have implemented/prototyped this, so I don't want the spec to be holding up a release.   We were going to use "engine_getPayloadV2" but that has been added to support withdrawals, so I'd like your input on the best way forward here.  It is ugly, but should we add "engine_getPayloadWithFeeV1 (current payload + block value) and engine_getPayloadWithFeeV2 (capella payload + block value)"?

author: m.kalinin
content: I left a couple of comments in the PR. As for the versioning, we should use `V2` for the block value update and `V3` for Shangai. Clients have already implemented `V2` and using it in withdrawals devnets but it shouldn't be a big problem cc <@539495253418180618>
